ingredients.ingredient: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix

cookingTips: Mix dressing mix with mayo ahead of time for flavors to develop
Slice cucumbers just before assembling to prevent sogginess
Spread dressing generously on bread but not so much it soaks through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These are simple appetizers perfect for entertaining. Would you like to prepare them ahead, or assemble closer to serving time?
